page.title: 01AREA SUMMARY.
page.content:
To the south of the area lies the northern, mainly residential, part of the town of{Stornoway}with adjacent areas of pasture land and mixed woodland.To the north is the district of{Laxdale.} The name is derived from two Norse words "Lax" and "Dale" meaning "the valley of the salmon." It is a rural area __ a crofting community with the majority of the working population commuting to and from Stornoway 2km. away. The district is comprised of many small villages and a local authority housing scheme.
{LAXDALE NORTH }-- Newmarket, Benside. {LAXDALE WEST }__ Newvalley, Maryhill, Marybank, Bennadrove, {LAXDALE EAST} __ Labost, Newpark, Laxdale. {LAXDALE SOUTH} __ Guershader,"Cearns."
